column2: Mouse was active and groomed, appeared healthy despite two large tumors on neck/back of head.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Two large tumors, total volume 2500cm cubed, sitting on right and left sides of neck.
No lung mets observed via gross observation
